Method Detail

addPlayer

boolean addPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
Adds the specified Player to the battle. This will return false if it is unsuccessful.

Parameters:
player - the Player to add
Returns:
true if successful

Returns the Arena that is set for this battle.

Returns:

getMaxPlayers

int getMaxPlayers()
Returns the maximum amount of players the battle can have. By default this is set to Integer.MAX_VALUE.

Returns:
the maxPlayers

Returns the minimum amount of players the battle requires before it can be started.

boolean removePlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
Removes the specified Player to the battle. This will return false if it is unsuccessful.

Parameters:
player - the Player to remove
Returns:
true if successful

respawn

void respawn(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
Respawns the specified Player at a random spawnpoint with a new set of their classes gear.

Parameters:
player -

setArena

void setArena(Arena arena)
Sets the Arena that will be used for this battle. The arena will not be set if this battle is in progress.

Parameters:
arena - the arena to set
See Also:
Arena

setMaxPlayers

void setMaxPlayers(int maxPlayers)
Sets the maximum amount of players the battle can have. Setting this value will prevent players from joining if the battle is full. This cannot be set to a value that is less than the minimum.

Parameters:
maxPlayers - the maxPlayers to set

setMinPlayers

void setMinPlayers(int minPlayers)
Sets the minimum amount of players the battle requires before it can be started. This cannot be set below one.

Parameters:
minPlayers - the minPlayers to set

start

boolean start()

stop

boolean stop()
